poem:
### Isolation in a Crowd

Tracks trace  
the dull round —  
meteors of monotony.  
Restless amidst  
messages, screens glow  
with idle chatter —  
absent echoes of  
warm bodies,  
distant.

Reach beyond  
the digital veneer,  
discover under  
persistent routine,  
the pulse, the  
heartbeat of  
friendship buried,  
awaiting recall  
—alive.
